attributes.action: Make Commercial Recycyling freely available, just like Private Household Recycyling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government wants to turn this country into a greener nation we need to ensure that companies, schools, restaurants and all other commercial organisations are supported when going green. Currently, Commercial Recycling comes at a high price: at approximately £50 per 50 recycling bags it is no wonder many of society's biggest polluters don't recycle. Private households recycle for free (paid for by tax money) although being the smaller polluter.
